node.title: Inland NSW towns brace for major flooding
node.description: Residents of the New South Wales towns of Forbes, Cowra, Nanami and Cotton's Weir are being urged to prepare for major floods as heavy rain and dam overflow makes its way down the the Lachlan River in the state's Central West.
node.content:
["Towns along some of New South Wales's inland rivers are bracing themselves for major flooding.", "A low pressure system has dumped more than 200 millimetres of rain in some areas since Thursday, and there are several flood\u00a0warnings in place for today and the coming days.", "The Macquarie River at\u00a0Bathurst peaked at 5.05 metres about\u00a09pm on Friday, with moderate flooding. There are\u00a0also warnings for the Belubula River and Mandagery Creek.", "Wyangala Dam in the Lachlan Valley is spilling over, continuing\u00a0flows into the Lachlan River.", "A peak of more than 12m\u00a0has been recorded on the Lachlan River in Cowra.\u00a0", "There is rain expected today, but it's not likely to have a significant\u00a0impact on the current situation.\u00a0", "", "
Flooding at Blayney in the Central West.(ABC Central West: Micaela Hambrett)
", "
Forbes in the firing line
", "Bureau of Meteorology hydrologist Alex Clifton said the biggest concern was the township of Forbes, as water in the Lachlan River made\u00a0its way downstream.", "He said it was likely to hit the major flood level at 10.55m\u00a0on Monday morning.", "", "
Wyangala Dam has filled and spilled after large inflows.(ABC Central West: Xanthe Gregory)
", "\"We're expecting to see major flooding at Nanami, which is upstream of Forbes, later today and major flooding at Forbes and Cotton's Weir from Sunday and Monday,\" Mr Clifton said.", "\"It is also important to understand it can be near that peak flood level up to a day before.", "\"The impact on Forbes town itself at the Iron Bridge there, we are expecting to see that from tomorrow.\"\u00a0", "Mayor of Forbes Phyllis Miller said the town was prepared, but she is urging\u00a0people not to be complacent.", "Councillor Miller\u00a0said she was expecting conditions to be similar to the 2016 flood, which peaked at 10.65m.", "\"We're very prepared, we've started to have our meetings with all the services we need to,\"\u00a0she said.", "\"Whatever people did to prepare for the 2016 flood, they should do that again now.", "\"If we dodge a bullet, we dodge a bullet, but I don't know if we're going to this time.\"\u00a0", "Councillor Miller said there was a helicopter on standby for rescues, just in case.", "Forbes residents are encouraged to check the\u00a0council website for local\u00a0information\u00a0", "Many changing warnings are expected over the next few days, so please keep up to date with your local warnings at ABC Emergency.\u00a0", "
SES receives hundreds of\u00a0calls for help
", "A number of people have been rescued from floodwaters and have called for help with fallen trees after the wild weather.\u00a0", "The State Emergency Service (SES) has received more than 280\u00a0calls for help in the past few days.", "There have been about\u00a012 flood rescues, including\u00a0a\u00a0young boy\u00a0from a car in floodwater near Orange, and a\u00a0man\u00a0from the roof of his car at Stuart Town.", "David Rankin\u00a0from the SES said\u00a0fallen trees had\u00a0been an additional issue.", "\"When it rains it pours, literally. A\u00a0lot of our volunteers have been out overnight assisting the community with trees that have come down,\" he said.\u00a0", "Mr Rankin\u00a0is urging\u00a0the public to make \"sensible decisions when they come across any flooded causeways and creeks\".", "\"Don't drive your car through it,\u00a0it's the easiest way to put yourself in a pretty significant amount of danger,\" he said.", "\"It puts our volunteers in danger when they have to come and rescue you. We want them to be safe when they're out on the job too.", "\"If it's flooded, forget it.\"\u00a0"]
